formulas.name: fmlCategory3
formulas.expression: CASE( TEXT({!$Record.Category_3__c}), "Supermarkets", VALUE({!$Label.Supermarket}), "Rail Companies", VALUE({!$Label.Rail_Companies}), "Courier Services", VALUE({!$Label.CourierServices}), "Technology Stores", VALUE({!$Label.Technology_Stores}), "Furniture Stores", VALUE({!$Label.Furniture_Stores_AF}), "Call center", VALUE({!$Label.Call_Centers_AF}), "Foods", VALUE({!$Label.Foods_AF}), "Parks", VALUE({!$Label.Parks_AF}), "NGO", VALUE({!$Label.NGO_AF}), "Airports", VALUE({!$Label.Airports_AF}), "Electrical Wholesalers", VALUE({!$Label.Electrical_Wholesalers_AF}), "Meat Products", VALUE({!$Label.Meat_Products_AF}), "Advertising Agencies", VALUE({!$Label.Advertising_Agencies_AF}), "Temporary Employment Agencies", VALUE({!$Label.Temporary_Employment_Agencies_AF}), "Headhunter", VALUE({!$Label.Headhunters_AF}), "Job promotion", VALUE({!$Label.Job_Promotion_AF}), 1 )

formulas.name: fmlEWSFallback
